name: MyKidsAreAnimals
0:
”Alexa, open My Kids Are Animals”
”Quiz me animal sounds!”
”What sound does a cat make?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my kids are animals
des:
Turn your kids into animals! 

Open the skill saying "Alexa, open My Kids Are Animals" and choose to hear animal sounds or get quizzed. 

You can say "What sound does the dog make?" and Alexa will answer, or you can start a quiz with "Quiz me".

This is the list of animals that are currently in this skill:

 - bear
 - cat
 - bird
 - chicken
 - crow
 - dog
 - elephant
 - horse
 - lion
 - monkey
 - rat
 - raven
 - rooster
 - sheep
 - turkey
 - wolf
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
